    CV

    Find below a general summary of my professional life. Click the toggles for more detailed descriptions and, in case of interest, reach out on LinkedIn for a formal CV with quantified outcomes of my work.

    Professional experience

    Quantum advocate, Jan 2023 - present QuEra Computing Inc.
    • Focused efforts on user development and strategic relations with government and partnerships
    • Developed first industry-grade course on quantum computing with neutral atoms with hundreds of trainees in the first year of deployment
    • Secured key positioning of the company with local state governments in the USA and countries abroad
    • Designed a partner network model that multiplexed the company's business capacity
    • Acted as spokesperson in events for user and executive education, as well as program lobbying
    Business developer, Jan 2022 - Dec 2022 QuEra Computing Inc.
    • Led all aspects of business development, including marketing, sales, partnerships, product management, and talent acquisition
    • Developed sales pipeline and secured strategic accounts with S&P500 corporations and national labs
    • Coordinated marketing of two product launches, including the world's first publicly accessible neutral-atom quantum computer. Verified solid user-base within half a year of launch
    • Onboarded top talent to company that generated IP in record time
    • Acted as spokesperson in events and increased company's presence manifold
    Project Manager, Jan 2020 - Dec 2021 Stewart Blusson Quantum Matter Institute - University of British Columbia
    • Directed multi-faculty teams, designing and managing a major institute-wide research program
    • Founded the institute's project management office, designed and defined research program management standards
    • Expedited creation of project charters and research development, leading teams to top journal publications within 9 months of program start
    • Supported resource acquisition initiatives including streamlined hiring processes and successful grant applications
    Consultant in Quantum Computing, Dec 2019 - Mar 2020 Physical Sciences Innovation Corporation
    • Drafted white paper and generated a data-base on the quantum computing global ecosystem for relations development with top management of the University of British Columbia.

    Academic experience

    Postdoctoral Fellow 2018-2019 Stewart Blusson Quantum Matter Institute - University of British Columbia
    Postdoctoral Fellow 2016-2018 Institut Quantique - Université de Sherbrooke

    Education

    PhD in Physics, 2016 Universidade Estadual de Campinas (Brazil)
    University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign
    Bachelor of Science in Physics, 2010 Universidade Estadual de Campinas (Brazil)
